|cpu1chip1 = EcoNet;EN7526GT; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 900 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX35LF1GE4AB-Z4I; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16JR-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[[Nokia G-240G-E]] • [https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/bt/g-240g-e_1 On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] • [[Nokia]] • [https://device.report/nokia/g-240g-e FCC] :CPU: [[EcoNet]] EN7526GT (EN751221) MIPS 34Kc V5.8 :CPU/Speed: 2x Thread 1x Core @900MHz :RAM: [[Nanya]] NT5CC128M16JR-EK 256MB (DDR3L 1866MHz) :Flash: [[Macronix]] MX35LF1GE4AB-Z4I 128MB (SPI NAND) :Ethernet: 4x GbE LAN (10/100/1000Mbit/s) :Fiber: 1x GPON SC-APC • Semtech GN25L98 :Phone: 2x RJ11 SIP & VoIP • [[MaxLinear]]/ :[[Intel (Lantiq)]] PEF32002 (SLLV5) SLIC
==See also== ===Models=== :;*[[Nokia]] • [[List of ONT Devices]] *[[Nokia G-240W-J]] • 2ADZRG240WJ (2019-10-25) • ISAM ONT + *[[Nokia G-240W-G]] • 2ADZRG240WG (2018-10-21) • ISAM ONT *[[Nokia G-240W-E]] • 2ADZRG240WE (2018-08-08) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia G-240W-C]] • 2ADZRG240W-C (2018-06-29) GPON ONU * *[[Nokia G-240W-F v2]] • 2ADZRG240WFV2 (2017-10-22) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia A-240Z-A]] • 2ADZRA240ZA (2017-09-30) • A-240Z-A * *[[Nokia G-240W-F]] • 2ADZRG240WF (2017-06-02) • G-240W-F *[[Nokia G-240WZ-A]] • 2ADZRG240WZA (2016-11-25) • Digital Home ONU *[[Nokia G-240W-A]] • 2ADZRG240WA (2016-07-19) • GPON ONT *[[Nokia G-240W-B]] • 2ADZRG240WB (2015-10-03) • GPON ONU * *[[Nokia G-241W-A]] • 2ADZRG241W-A (2015-07-24) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia I-240W-A]] • 2ADZRI240WA (2015-07-14) • GPON ONU
